description: A vulnerability was found in Liferay Portal and DXP (the affected version unknown). It has been declared as problematic. This vulnerability affects an unknown part of the component Organization Selector Handler. There is no information about possible countermeasures known. It may be suggested to replace the affected object with an alternative product.
mitigations: There is no information about possible countermeasures known. It may be suggested to replace the affected object with an alternative product.
title: Liferay Portal/DXP Organization Selector authorization
